trans-unit.source: Defines the SOAP fault codes that appear in a SOAP message when an error occurs while communicating with XML Web services using the SOAP version 1.2 protocol.
trans-unit.target: Define os códigos de falha SOAP que aparecem em uma mensagem SOAP quando ocorre um erro durante a comunicação com serviços Web XML usando o protocolo SOAP versão 1.2.

trans-unit.source: A SOAP fault in version 1.2 of the SOAP specification contains a `Code` element and among other things an optional `Subcode` element.
trans-unit.target: Uma falha SOAP na versão 1.2 da especificação de SOAP contém um `Code` elemento e, dentre outras coisas um opcional `Subcode` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `Code` element is one of a pre-defined set of codes, informing a recipient that the cause of the error fell into one of five large error categories.
trans-unit.target: O `Code` elemento é parte de um conjunto predefinido de códigos, informando um destinatário que a causa do erro ficou em cinco categorias de erro grandes.

trans-unit.source: Those five fault codes are represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.ReceiverFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.VersionMismatchFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.MustUnderstandFaultCode>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode> fields.
trans-unit.target: Esses códigos de falha de cinco são representados pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.ReceiverFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.VersionMismatchFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.MustUnderstandFaultCode>, e <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode>campos.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.MustUnderstandFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.VersionMismatchFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.ReceiverFaultCode>

trans-unit.source: The `Subcode` element allows the sender of the SOAP fault to provide an application-specific error code.
trans-unit.target: O `Subcode` elemento permite que o remetente da falha de SOAP fornecer um código de erro específico do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET defines two such codes that are represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIDFaultCode>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode> fields.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET define dois esses códigos são representados pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIDFaultCode>, e <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode>campos.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIDFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode>

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service throwing an exception sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property, which represents the `Code` element, when a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> class is created.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço Web XML lançar uma exceção conjuntos de <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>propriedade, que representa o `Code` elemento, quando uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>classe é criada.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>

trans-unit.source: That error is transmitted over the wire as a SOAP fault, which a .NET Framework client can catch as a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>.
trans-unit.target: Esse erro é transmitida pela rede como uma falha de SOAP, um cliente do .NET Framework pode capturar como <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataEncodingUnknown" name="DataEncodingUnknown" href=""></xref> fault code indicating the SOAP message is encoded in an unrecognized format.
trans-unit.target: Representa o SOAP versão 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataEncodingUnknown" name="DataEncodingUnknown" href=""> </xref> código de falha, indicando que a mensagem SOAP é codificado em um formato não reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not automatically throw a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property set to DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET não gera automaticamente um <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>com o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>propriedade definida como DataEncodingUnknownFaultCode.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the fault code for missing ID in SOAP encoding data.
trans-unit.target: Representa o código de falha de ID ausente nos dados de codificação de SOAP.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_enc:UntypedValue" name="enc:UntypedValue" href=""></xref> fault subcode indicating that the SOAP message was RPC-encoded and the type name property of an encoded graph node was not specified.
trans-unit.target: Representa o SOAP versão 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_enc:UntypedValue" name="enc:UntypedValue" href=""> </xref> subcódigo indicando que a mensagem SOAP que foi codificado RPC e a propriedade de nome de tipo de um nó do gráfico codificado não foi especificada.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not automatically throw a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set to EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET não gera automaticamente um <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>com o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade definida como EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> class has a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> property of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> that represents the SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>classe tiver um <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A>propriedade do tipo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode>que representa o subcódigo de falhas SOAP.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents the URI for the actual SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade representa o URI para o subcódigo de falhas SOAP real.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode, set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade como EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode, defina a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""></xref> fault code indicating a SOAP header marked with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""></xref> attribute was not processed.
trans-unit.target: Representa o SOAP versão 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""> </xref> código de falha que indica um cabeçalho SOAP marcado com o <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""> </xref> atributo não foi processado.

trans-unit.source: Not all SOAP headers require processing by the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Nem todos os cabeçalhos SOAP não exigem processamento pelo destinatário.

trans-unit.source: However, if a SOAP header is marked with the `MustUnderstand` attribute equal to "true", processing is required.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se um cabeçalho SOAP é marcado com o `MustUnderstand` atributo igual ao processamento de "true", é necessário.

trans-unit.source: Failure to process the header when it resides within a SOAP 1.2 request generates a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property set to MustUnderstandFaultCode.
trans-unit.target: Falha ao processar o cabeçalho quando ele estiver dentro de uma solicitação SOAP 1.2 gera um <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>com o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>propriedade definida como MustUnderstandFaultCode.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>

trans-unit.source: If the SOAP request resided within a SOAP 1.1 request, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se a solicitação SOAP residia dentro de uma solicitação SOAP 1.1, a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 define `MustUnderstand` SOAP fault codes differing only by the version of the SOAP protocol used to send the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: Definem SOAP 1.1 e 1.2 `MustUnderstand` códigos de falha SOAP difere somente pela versão do protocolo SOAP usada para enviar a mensagem SOAP.

trans-unit.source: This field represents the SOAP 1.2 version, and the SOAP 1.1 version is represented by <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Este campo representa a versão do SOAP 1.2 e a versão do SOAP 1.1 é representada pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.MustUnderstandFaultCode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The two fields map to different qualified names, but you can check whether the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property is either one of the fault codes by calling the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsMustUnderstandFaultCode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Os dois campos mapeiam para nomes qualificados diferentes, mas você pode verificar se o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>propriedade é um dos códigos de falha ao chamar o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsMustUnderstandFaultCode%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsMustUnderstandFaultCode%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Receiver" name="Receiver" href=""></xref> fault code indicating an error occurred during the processing of a client call on the server due to a problem with the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Representa o SOAP versão 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Receiver" name="Receiver" href=""> </xref> código de falha que indica um erro ocorreu durante o processamento de uma chamada de cliente no servidor devido a um problema com o destinatário.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property set to ReceiverFaultCode when a server is called and it could not respond to a request due to network problems.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>será lançada com o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>propriedade definida como ReceiverFaultCode quando um servidor é chamado e ele não pode responder a uma solicitação devido a problemas de rede.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: Typically, with this type of exception, the client call may succeed later.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esse tipo de exceção, a chamada do cliente poderá ser bem-sucedida mais tarde.

trans-unit.source: The `Receiver` SOAP fault code is similar to the `Server` fault code, which is represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ServerFaultCode> field, but the `Server` fault code is used when the SOAP request is sent using SOAP 1.1.
trans-unit.target: O `Receiver` código de falha SOAP é semelhante de `Server` falhas de código, que é representado pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ServerFaultCode>campo, mas o `Server` código de falha é usado quando a solicitação SOAP é enviada usando SOAP 1.1.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ServerFaultCode>

trans-unit.source: To check whether the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property is either the `Receiver` or `Server` SOAP fault codes, call the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsServerFaultCode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para verificar se o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>propriedade é o `Receiver` ou `Server` códigos de falha SOAP, chame o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsServerFaultCode%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsServerFaultCode%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_rpc:BadArguments" name="rpc:BadArguments" href=""></xref> fault subcode indicating that arguments sent to the XML Web service method were incorrect or could not be parsed.
trans-unit.target: Representa o SOAP versão 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_rpc:BadArguments" name="rpc:BadArguments" href=""> </xref> subcódigo indicando que os argumentos enviados para o método de serviço Web XML estavam incorretos ou não podem ser analisados.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not automatically throw a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set to RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET não gera automaticamente um <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>com o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade definida como RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> class has a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> property of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> that represents the SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>classe tiver um <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A>propriedade do tipo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode>que representa o subcódigo de falhas SOAP.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents the URI for the actual SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade representa o URI para o subcódigo de falhas SOAP real.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode, set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade como RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode, defina a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_rpc:ProcedureNotPresent" name="rpc:ProcedureNotPresent" href=""></xref> fault subcode indicating the XML Web service does not support the requested XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Representa o SOAP versão 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_rpc:ProcedureNotPresent" name="rpc:ProcedureNotPresent" href=""> </xref> subcódigo falha indicando que o serviço Web XML não oferece suporte para o método de serviço Web XML solicitado.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not automatically throw a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set to RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET não gera automaticamente um <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>com o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade definida como RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> class has a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> property of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> that represents the SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>classe tiver um <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A>propriedade do tipo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode>que representa o subcódigo de falhas SOAP.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Subcode%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents the URI for the actual SOAP fault subcode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade representa o URI para o subcódigo de falhas SOAP real.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode, set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade como RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode, defina a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.SenderFaultCode> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode.Code%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Sender" name="Sender" href=""></xref> fault code indicating a client call was not formatted correctly or did not contain the appropriate information.
trans-unit.target: Representa o SOAP versão 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Sender" name="Sender" href=""> </xref> código de falha, indicando uma chamada de cliente não foi formatado corretamente ou não contém as informações apropriadas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property set to SenderFaultCode when a SOAP 1.2 request is malformed or a parameter is missing.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>será lançada com o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>propriedade definida como SenderFaultCode quando uma solicitação de SOAP 1.2 está mal formada ou um parâmetro está ausente.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: The `Sender` SOAP fault code is similar to the `Client` fault code, which is represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ClientFaultCode> field, but the `Client` fault code is used when the SOAP request is sent using SOAP 1.1.
trans-unit.target: O `Sender` código de falha SOAP é semelhante de `Client` falhas de código, que é representado pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ClientFaultCode>campo, mas o `Client` código de falha é usado quando a solicitação SOAP é enviada usando SOAP 1.1.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.ClientFaultCode>

trans-unit.source: To check whether the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property is either the `Sender` or `Client` SOAP fault codes, call the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsClientFaultCode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para verificar se o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>propriedade é o `Sender` ou `Client` códigos de falha SOAP, chame o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsClientFaultCode%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.IsClientFaultCode%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the SOAP version 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_VersionMismatch" name="VersionMismatch" href=""></xref> fault code indicating the XML Web service expected SOAP messages conforming to the SOAP 1.2 specification, yet received one conforming to SOAP 1.1.
trans-unit.target: Representa o SOAP versão 1.2 <xref uid="langword_csharp_VersionMismatch" name="VersionMismatch" href=""> </xref> código de falha, indicando que o serviço Web XML esperado mensagens SOAP em conformidade com a especificação de SOAP 1.2, mas recebido um em conformidade com o SOAP 1.1.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
